parameters.description: ID of visible element. Each element has an ID that is returned on validation endpoints.

parameters.description: The type of element to create, sginature, sinitial, date, datetime, text

parameters.description: Metadata of visible elements to associate with the document

parameters.name: coordinates
parameters.description: Coortinates of a visible element on PDF

parameters.description: UUID of sign request. The signer UUID is what the person receives via email when asked to sign. This is not the file UUID.

parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass
